snippet: Cornerback Jayron Hosley allowed big plays, and tailback David Wilson, Hosley’s teammate at Virginia Tech, was stopped on a key fourth down and finished with 55 yards on 12 carries.
abstract: New York Giants rookies cornerback Jayron Hosley and tailback David Wilson, teammates at Virginia Tech, offer little help in team's loss to Atlanta Falcons.
lead_paragraph: Cornerback Jayron Hosley allowed big plays, and tailback David Wilson, Hosley’s teammate at Virginia Tech, was stopped on a key fourth down and finished with 55 yards on 12 carries.

headline.seo: Giants Rookies Step Into Larger Roles With Frustrating Results
headline.main: Giants Rookies Step Into Larger Roles With Frustrating Results
headline.print_headline: Giants Rookies Step Into Larger Roles With Frustrating Results
